CHAT.comment: Time is 27:19. Videotape does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio

Chi plays with the objects by herself for the most part. Mot rarely touches any of them but she does watch what Chi is doing and offers suggestions. New activities are begun by Chi. Science talk is limited , although Mot does attempt to explain to Chi why objects are behaving a certain way by using the word current. Chi's younger brother Bro is seated on Mot's lap and occasionally his babbling overpowers the talk.

u.a: explains activity; that she'll be videotaping it and that she will be focusing on their hands
explains a bit more and says she will stop them in about ten minutes
MOT and EXP talk about the light in the room
video starts here
MOT and Chi are seated at corners of a table; magnets are set up on the table between them; the black base is nearly empty and most of the objects are in a pile in front of the Chi

the objects fall off the wand

pulls wand away from black base

holds black base over the pile of magnets on the table; they stick to the bottom of it
holds yellow wand under the objects suspended from the black base that Chi is holding
